description.narrative: UNDP and IOM will jointly implement gender-transformational conflict prevention interventions given the heightened risk of climate-induced conflicts in the PNG Highlands due to increased climate vulnerability of communities arising from climate change.

activity-description.narrative: Empowering Women Leadership for climate induced conflict management
Empowering Women Leadership for climate induced conflict management

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative:
Outcome 1: Increased active participation of women in communities in community action to mitigate climate-induced conflict risks Outcome Indicator 1a: Proportion of women in target communities participating in/contributing to peacebuilding within communities by age. Output 1.1: Capacity of women community leadership particularly in climate-induced conflicts and in the development of climate adaptation measures is strengthened. Activity 1.1.1 Delivering training of women community leaders in awareness of climate-induced risks and local approaches/ to mitigate risks (UNDP) Output Indicator 1.1.1: Women’s self-rating of their understanding of climate-related security risks. Activity 1.1.2 Support community-led establishment of inclusive community civic spaces to facilitate collective decision-making (UNDP) Output Indicator 1.1.2: Women’s self-rating of their ability to contribute toward adaptation needs. Output Indicator 1.1.3: Proportion of community members in target communities who believe that community dialogue is inclusive for women participation and responsive to undertaken climate and conflict-sensitive actions, by sex and age.
Outcome 2: Communities and households have improved resilience to manage risks and mitigate shocks from conflict and human induced/natural disasters Outcome Indicator 2a: Assessed vulnerability of target communities. Output 2.2: Provincial policies and strategic frameworks are informed by climate-induced peace and security risks. Activity 2.2.1 Conduct of provincial and sub-provincial climate risk assessment in both Hela and Southern Highlands provinces (UNDP) Output Indicator 2.2.1: Number of communities targeted for support in development and implementation of community peace for development plans informed through provincial and sub-provincial climate risk assessments. Activity 2.2.2 Support provincial authorities in development of provincial climate and gender-sensitive peace and security strategies with costed provincial action
